head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths REED, DANA KEITH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths REED, DANA KEITH

block.p: REED--Dana Keith. 58, of Washington, NJ died on Tuesday January 2, 2007 at Hackensack University Medical Center surrounded by family and friends. A Memorial Service followed by repost will by held in Manhattan at the Cathedral Church of Saint John the Divine on Monday, January 29, 2007 at 2:30 pm (212) 316-7490, www.stjohndivine.org. All who loved and respected Dana Reed are welcome to attend. Born and raised in Harlem, Dana attended Public School #
